text:
@VoteBlueIn2020 Pence assures the American public that the Coronavirus Outbreak will be over by:

D-Day...
        or if not then...
Father's Day...
Independence Day...
Tisha B'Av...
Labor Day
... or possibly Halloween.
But definitely by Christmas 'cause #COVID doesn't want to piss off Jesus.
